p: There is a wide-ranging scope in the global land grabs literature. A selection of studies includes: Alonso-Fradejas (2012), Dell’Angelo et al. (2017), Edelman et al. (2013), Hall (2011), Moreda (2017), Müller et al. (2021), Rahmato (2011), Rulli et al. (2013), White et al. (2012), Wolford et al. (2013), Xu (2019), Zoomers (2010).
